title: fifth pipe dream-san francisco sound-1968-24K-ALAC-freQazoidiac
description:

FREQAZOIDIAC  -  UNIQUES  
presents :

24K (bit) from Original USA stereo LP.

01-bulgaria-IT'S A BEAUTIFUL DAY.aif
02-aquarian dream-IT'S A BEAUTIFUL DAY.aif
03-you're the woman-TRIPSICHORD MUSIC BOX.aif
04-it's not good-TRIPSICHORD MUSIC BOX.aif
05-two's a pair-INDIAN PUDDIN & PIPE.aif
06-beyond this place-INDIAN PUDDIN & PIPE.aif
07-hashish-INDIAN PUDDIN & PIPE.aif
08-water or wine-INDIAN PUDDIN & PIPE.aif

10-lady blonde-BLACK SWAN.aiff
11-she encircles me-BLACK SWAN.aiff

NFO-fifthPipeDream.txt
LP24-grphxFIFTHPIPE.pdf
950xfifthPipeDream.jpg





So many connections on this fabulous album - too many to mention. 
The guy that peaked my interest who was involved was Marcus Uzilevsky aka
Rusty Evans aka Ry Cooper
who was the guy behind the DEEP - psychedelic Moods Lp and Freak Scene Psychedelic Psoul. I can hear his voice clearly on a few tracks  including the Beauitful Day  song "aquarian dream". The 1st track bulgaria is a dramatically different version than what is found on their first LP. 
The band Tripsichord previously was the Ban (brent records) and then the Now (on embassy) to finally come into maturity with Tripsichord Music Box.
